text: The knockout stage of the 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup consisted of the top two teams of each of the four groups. It began on July 9 and ended with the Final on July 17, 2011. ==Qualified teams== {| class=wikitable |- ! Group !width=150| Winners !width=150| Runners-up |- ! A | | |- ! B | | |- ! C | | |- !
